entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'you' in the dream.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, whose ears go red when Harry lies about his dream.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: A sport played by wizards and witches in the story.

entities.name: department of mysteries corridor
entities.description: A place where Harry has a recurring dream or vision, described as a journey along a corridor.

entities.name: circular room
entities.description: One of the rooms in the Department of Mysteries corridor that Harry passes through in his dream.

entities.name: room full of clicking and dancing light
entities.description: Another room in the Department of Mysteries corridor, described as having a unique and dynamic atmosphere.

entities.name: cavernous room with shelves
entities.description: A large room filled with shelves containing dusty glass spheres, where Harry finds himself in his dream.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: An object used in the game of Quidditch, mentioned as something Harry tries to get Ron to grab in his dream.

relationships.description: Harry lies to Ron about having a dream where he was watching him play Quidditch.
Harry has a recurring dream or vision where he visits the Department of Mysteries corridor, which is described as a journey along a corridor.
In his dream, Harry passes through the circular room in the Department of Mysteries corridor.

relationships.entity_2: room full of clicking and dancing light
relationships.description: Harry also passes through the room full of clicking and dancing light in his dream, which is another part of the Department of Mysteries corridor.
In his dream, Harry finds himself inside the cavernous room filled with shelves containing dusty glass spheres.
In his dream, Harry tries to get Ron to grab the Quaffle in order to play Quidditch.
